content: I have too much bandwidth available so I thought to myself. How can I use it all? Simple! Blockchain for my EHR. That way all data is replicated 10,000 times and the bandwidth is used! I thought at first only putting audit on the blockchain but then there was still some left. Now I've brought my gigabit network to a crawl. Thanks Blockchain!
Suggest using Bogchain - an even simple way to flush project money down the toilet.
